Lamia:

Lamia hidden in the hole, she still can sense a Quickstride around =
and she didnt wanted to take any risk.


From: Kraftlos 
Sent: Thursday, Ma=
rch 11, 2010 5:32 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: The Old Maxim=
al Base/Unicron's come back


  
"I REPEAT!  YOU MINIONS MAY LEAVE NOW WITH=
OUT A FIGHT." shouted Perseus down into the belly of the base.  "Hmmm... wh=
at am I thinking we can just turn on the lights now that we have power.  *k=
eyed his radio* Salveo, lights please."

All up and down the hallway, the i=
nterior lights flickered on.  They were all of the utility light design wit=
h an iron cage around them; the ones near the entrance were damaged however=
 and didn't light up.

Ravenchief suddenly darted off toward the entrance w=
ithout saying anything.  He hovered close to he ceiling, weapons ready.

"W=
ho goes there?!?"

Meanwhile....

"Stasis activation complete."

Kenzo watc=
hed as gasses arose from around the chamber's door.  It slid open revealing=
 a metalic blue-colored bot.

"Who are you!?!" the stranger asked.

"You do=
n't show up on the Maximal crew roster, so I could ask you the same thing."=
 replied Kenzo.  "We're the Pasificus Maximals.... well just the Maximals n=
ow.  Our base was destroyed so we moved in here.  The Silver Wings are appa=
rently not around anymore."

"What?  This base was empty.  I used my access=
 code to get in here and rest."

"You would've been trapped in there a long=
 time if we hadn't come and turned on the power."

"No, there was a failsaf=
e.  It would've woken me up when reserve power started to get low."

Kenzo =
took a step back and allowed him to step out of the CR chamber.

"Commander=
 Depthcharge, Maximal Security," he said cordially. extending an hand.

"Ke=
nzo, I'm this unit's doctor." he replied, shaking his hand.




On Thu, Mar=
 11, 2010 at 3:47 AM, Preston Carroll <supercyclonus@...> wrote:



 =
 The large purple, black and silver dragon that was Marauder continued to f=
loat silently and majestically above the old Maximal base, like a predator =
waiting patiently for the object of its desire to reveal itself.  


  "Wel=
l." Marauder transmitted to the the Maximals, "Where is she?" he voice was =
becoming more and more aggressive as time passed as was his posture. 


  L=
egacy paused as he scanned the base. Several new Maximal signatures suddenl=
y sprang to life on his screen. Swiftly he opened communication lines to Ra=
t trap and Quickstride, "Greetings." Legacy's typically cold voice intoned =
across the airwaves, "There is a minion in your vicinity, it has been given=
 permission to leave."


  Meanwhile as Legacy spoke, Marauder moved over t=
owards the opening that Quckstride and rat Trap had just used to enter the =
base, as if something had attracted his attention there. 


  (TAG)


  Pre=
ston
  (Legacy/Marauder)
